description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today inaugurated building of Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University, dedicated 400KV Lucknow-Kanpur D/C transmission line and distributed sanction le
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Sharing my speech at the programme in Lucknow, where various projects were inaugurated. I compliment the UP Government under CM Yogi Adityanath for their development initiatives that are empowering all sections of society.

Emphasised on why the youth of India must remain connected with technology & innovation. Also spoke on immense potential in start up sector. http://nm-4.com/kr14
